original_text: And ye shall be holy men unto me: neither shall ye eat any flesh that is torn of beasts in the field; ye shall cast it to the dogs.
korean_text: 너희는 내게 거룩한 사람이 될지니 들에서 짐승에게 찢긴 동물의 고기를 먹지 말고 그것을 개에게 던질지니라

sentences.original_text: And ye shall be holy men unto me
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 나를 위해 거룩한 사람들이 될 것이다

sentences.original_text: neither shall ye eat any flesh
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 어떤 고기도 먹지 말아야 한다

sentences.original_text: that is torn of beasts in the field
ye shall cast it to the dogs
